title: Costant 150 ms
body:
Since 3 days ago my ping went to 150 and did not drop,i ussusally play  around 50-60 but now it just doesnt drop,i have tried everything and even got around to reinstall windows to try to fix this and clean my pc 
pls help 
sorry bad englishky xD

replies.body: Eu sou português e estou como o mesmo problema lol, pensei que fosse algum erro desinstalei o jogo voltei a instalar e nada... bahh xD já pensava que era do meu pc mas pelos vistos não. Menos mal...
I have the same problem :/ are u from Portugal ?
I'm also getting 150 MS, and I'm also from Portugal.

I've been seeing some issues with connections that route through Telia, which is a major backbone provider in the EU region. I recommend working through our [connection guide](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues) to ensure this isn't caused by a local network setting that could easily be changed.

Let me know if this caused any change to your latency.

No it didnt,its actually a problem from NOS in portugal i thing,im having the same issue, and im allways at 150ms from 2 or 3 days ago. Please fix it ... Its kinda annoying playing with 150,i guess you already know it :/ ty.

Unfortunately, if this is caused by an ISP or backbone provider in your local area, there's nothing we can do about it from our side. You'll want to get in contact with a tech support agent at your ISP in order to have this investigated and resolved.

Let me know if you have any questions.
